Also, make sure this is on ur memory cards bc if you move it to ur phone, the theme will go away

Please, how do I use this .asec file to install the .apk? I have been on android for years now yet never have I encountered .asec format app.
Please help me out here i been looking for this Cm7 theme for months, finally I find it here but dont know how to use this .asec file!

This is just really pissing me off... I have searched and searched for 3 days now and every post I have found says there is no way to install an app from a .asec file. A .asec file is a encrypted copy of the apk file that has been moved using app2sd, so how can i possibly use this file to install the damn theme! I cant understand why you would upload your .asec file and not .apk.
i uploaded this through a program Titanium Backup Pro. Let me see if I can find the apk for you, good sir
